term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - speed of light in a vacuum
term.title: speed of light in a vacuum

item.text: The speed of light in vacuum, c, is one of seven fixed constants defining the International System of Units, the SI, with c = 299 792 458 m s-1. The speed of light is considered as a fundamental constant of nature.

item.meaning: speed of light in a vacuum
